lemma simple_greedy_approximation: "VARS T A i j {True} T := (\<lambda>_. 0); A := (\<lambda>_. {}); j := 0; WHILE j < n INV {inv\<^sub>1 T A j} DO i := min\<^sub>k T m; j := (Suc j); A := A (i := A(i) \<union> {j}); T := T (i := T(i) + t j) OD {lb T A n \<and> (\<forall>T' A'. lb T' A' n \<longrightarrow> makespan T \<le> 2 * makespan T')}"
